name: Space Miner (Jack3G)
description:
Mine gold in space while managing your oxygen supply.

Be an astronaut with a pickaxe .
Break yellow rocks to get precious gold.
Break blue rocks to fill up your O2 tanks, because oxygen is important.
Use your boost pack  to float around in space.

A screenshot:

The game is open source! Available right here ---> https://github.com/Jack3G/space-miner

The controls are in the options menu, but just in case:
- WASD or Left Stick to move.
- Space or bottom button (XBox A, Nintendo B, Playstation X) to jump or, boost in the direction you're holding.
- F or left button (XBox X, Nintendo Y, Playstation Square) to swing your pick.


Here's a video of me while I was making spaceman's movement:


Note: I've noticed that the web version has some slight visual issues i.e. the particles don't render and sometimes the text disappears. I'm not sure if there's anything I can do to fix it ¯\_( '-' )_/¯
